name: Skin Editor Matte Foundation - N 03: 12-Hour Flawless Coverage for Perfect Skin
description:
Skin Editor Matte Foundation - N 03: The Ultimate Complexion Perfector

Skin Editor Matte Foundation - N 03 delivers flawless coverage with a natural matte finish that lasts all day. This premium foundation is specially formulated to balance oil production while providing medium to full coverage that feels lightweight on the skin. The N 03 shade is perfectly calibrated for light to medium skin tones with neutral undertones, creating a seamless match that looks like your skin, only better. 💫

Product Information

Size30ml / 1.0 fl oz
Product TypeLiquid Foundation
FinishMatte
CoverageMedium to Full (Buildable)
ShadeN 03 (Light to Medium with Neutral Undertones)

Key Features of Skin Editor Matte Foundation - N 03

  • 🌟 Oil-controlling formula that maintains a matte finish for up to 12 hours
  • 🌟 Non-comedogenic and dermatologist tested
  • 🌟 Infused with skin-loving ingredients including Vitamin E and Hyaluronic Acid
  • 🌟 Buildable coverage that never looks cakey or settles into fine lines
  • 🌟 Transfer-resistant and sweat-proof for all-day wear

The Technology Behind Skin Editor Matte Foundation

The innovative formula in Skin Editor Matte Foundation - N 03 features micro-mesh technology that absorbs excess oil while allowing skin to breathe. The foundation contains light-diffusing particles that blur imperfections and create a soft-focus effect, minimizing the appearance of pores and texture. Unlike many matte foundations, this formula doesn't dry out skin thanks to its hydrating complex that maintains moisture balance throughout the day. 💧

How to Apply for Best Results

For optimal application of Skin Editor Matte Foundation - N 03, start with a small amount and blend outward from the center of your face using a damp beauty sponge, foundation brush, or fingertips. The formula sets quickly, so work in sections. For additional coverage, layer the product rather than applying too much at once. Set with a translucent powder for extended wear in oily areas.

Looking for more coverage? Try our high-performance concealers that pair perfectly with this foundation. For a dewy alternative, explore our Skin Editor Hydrating Foundation. Complete your base with our bestselling setting powders for a truly flawless finish.

Frequently Asked Question

Is Skin Editor Matte Foundation suitable for sensitive skin?
Yes, Skin Editor Matte Foundation - N 03 is formulated without common irritants and has been dermatologist tested for sensitive skin. The non-comedogenic formula is free from parabens, phthalates, and synthetic fragrances, making it suitable for most skin types, including sensitive skin. However, as with any cosmetic product, we recommend patch testing if you have specific sensitivities.
short_description: Skin Editor Matte Foundation - N 03 delivers flawless, oil-controlling coverage for light to medium neutral skin tones. This lightweight, buildable formula creates a natural matte finish that lasts up to 12 hours without caking or settling into fine lines.
